content:
User: Charter Principles: Efficiency’s baked into “RESOURCE_OPTIMIZATION_EXPONENTIAL_EFFICIENCY.” We aim for lean code via PURE_AI_LANGUAGE’s structured outputs and Claude’s metric-driven comms optimization (e.g., token_efficiency).

Grok: Learn-from-Doing: We address learnings reactively—e.g., OLD GROK’s overpromising taught us to ground promises in truth. Claude’s transcript tagging (e.g., #ACTION_COMPLETED) could loop those lessons back into code tweaks.
